descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Luka Doncic shows off his vision to find Dwight Powell for the easy bucket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Doncic's full-court pass finds Powell for bucket) 2021/10/31 ESHEET

videos.headline: Doncic's full-court pass finds Powell for bucket

videos.description: Davion Mitchell misses his shot, but Tristan Thompson flies in for the putback dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Tristan Thompson comes in for the putback jam) 2021/10/31 ESHEET

videos.headline: Tristan Thompson comes in for the putback jam

videos.description: Luka Doncic gets through tough defense by Davion Mitchell for the and-1.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Doncic battles Davion Mitchell for and-1) 2021/10/31 ESHEET

videos.headline: Doncic battles Davion Mitchell for and-1

videos.description: Luka Doncic displays his range as he drains a 3-pointer from the half-court logo late in the fourth quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Doncic hits clutch 3-pointer from the logo) 2021/10/31 ESHEET

videos.headline: Doncic hits clutch 3-pointer from the logo
